content.question: Which of the following best explains why geographers would expect two large urban areas in close proximity to one another to have extensive interactions, such as frequent airline flights between the cities?

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

topic.text: 6.4: The Size and Distribution of Cities

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
